an7.82:4.1: “Sattahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato vinayadharo sobhati.
an7.82:4.3: Āpattiṃ jānāti, anāpattiṃ jānāti, lahukaṃ āpattiṃ jānāti, garukaṃ āpattiṃ jānāti, anekavihitaṃ pubbenivāsaṃ anussarati, seyyathidaṃ—
an7.82:4.5: iti sākāraṃ sauddesaṃ anekavihitaṃ pubbenivāsaṃ anussarati, dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena … pe …
an7.82:4.8: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, sattahi dhammehi samannāgato vinayadharo sobhatī”ti.
